Key Match Events: Pakistan secured their place in the World Cup semi-finals by beating Bangladesh by 5 wickets
Shaheen Shah Afridi picked up 4-22 in Bangladesh's 127-8
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan captain Babar Azam mentioned that the pitch was difficult but the team enjoyed the performance
Bangladesh skipper Shakib Al Hasan stated that the team wanted to score around 145 but found it challenging due to the pitch conditions
Post-Match Reflections: Pakistan captain Babar Azam expressed happiness and excitement for the semi-finals
Bangladesh skipper Shakib Al Hasan acknowledged the team's effort but felt they could have done better
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa were eliminated after losing to the Netherlands
India advanced to the semi-finals with South Africa's defeat
